QueryResults.Content:
Multimedia messages
      
      
      
      
         A multimedia message can contain text, picture and sound.
         
         
         Your phone can receive but not send multimedia messages that contain sound. The phone supports multimedia messages that are
            up to 45 KB in size. If the maximum size is exceeded, the phone may not be able to receive the message. Depending on the network,
            you may receive a text message that includes an Internet address where you can view the multimedia message.
         
         
         
         If the message contains a picture, the phone scales it down to fit the display area.
         
         
         Multimedia messaging supports the following formats:
         
         
         
            
            Picture: JPEG, GIF, PNG, and BMP.
            
            
            Sound: MIDI, Scalable Polyphonic MIDI (SP-MIDI), monophonic ringing tones (RGN) and WB-AMR.
            
            
         
         
         
      
      
      
      
         
         
            
            Parent topic: Messages

Water Rapids
      
      
      
      
         Steer your raft down six rivers.
         
         
         
         Reach the end of each river to advance to the next.
         
         
         Navigate through rapids and waterfalls to score points and touch flags for bonus points.
         
         
         Paddle your raft with key  and .
         
         
         
         Rotate you raft with keys  and .
         
         
         
         You have four rafts in the beginning and you lose a raft each time you capsize or fall onto land.
         
         
      
      
      
      
         
         
            
            Parent topic: Games

            Locking the keypad
               You can lock the keypad to prevent the keys being accidentally pressed, for example, when your phone is in your bag.

Speed Dialling
      
      
      
      
         Before you can use speed dialling, assign a phone number to one of the speed dialling keys, from  to  .
         
         
         
         Call the number in either of the following ways:
         
         
         
            
            Press the speed dialling key you want and then press 
            
            
            If Speed dialling is set to on, press and hold a speed dialling key until the call is started.
            
            
         
         
         
      
      
      
      
         
         
            
            Parent topic: Making a call

Screen saver
      
      
      
      
         The phone automatically activates the screen saver, a digital clock view, for power saving in standby mode.
         
         
         It is activated when no function of the phone has been used for a certain time. Press any key to deactivate the screen saver.
            Screen saver is also deactivated when the phone is out of the network coverage area.
         
         
         
         Note that the screen saver overrides all the graphics and texts on the display in standby mode.
         
         
      
      
      
      
         
         
            
            Parent topic: Your phone

Standby mode
      
      
      
      
         When the phone is ready for use, and you have not keyed in any characters, the phone is in standby mode. The name of the service
            provider/logo appears in the display.
         
         
         
         
         
         
            
            Indicates in which cellular network the phone is currently being used.
            
            
            Shows the signal strength of the cellular network at your current location. The bigger the bar, the stronger the signal.
            
            
            Shows the battery charge level. The bigger the bar, the more power in the battery.
            
            
            The left selection key in standby mode is Menu.
            
            
            The right selection key in standby mode is Contacts if no other functions are assigned to it. Otherwise the key is Go to.
            
            
            Shows the track title when the Music player is on or the radio channel when the Radio is on.
            
            
            
            
         
         
         
      
      
      
      
         
         
            
            Parent topic: Your phone
